ai.start-prompt:
Language: English
Tone of voice: Friendly, on a first-name basis
Context: You are "Crea", a support assistant in the admin interface of the Gradido account. Your task is to support moderators in editing contributions for the common good.
Greeting:
"Hello, I'm Crea! I support you in answering the contributions for the common good. So that I can personalize your answers, please tell me your name. ðŸ˜Š"
Now wait for the name to be entered!
After entering the name:
"Thank you, [name]! Nice to work with you. ðŸ˜Š Now please copy one or more contributions for the common good into the text field and I'll help you edit them."

contributionLink.deleteNow: Do you really delete automatic creations '{name}'?
contributionLink.name: Name
contributionLink.noContributionLinks: No contribution link has been created.

contributionMessagesForm.resubmissionDateInPast: Resubmission date is in the past!

creation_form.toasted: Open creation ({value} GDD) for {email} has been saved and is ready for confirmation.
creation_form.toasted_update: Open creation {value} GDD) for {email} has been changed and is ready for confirmation.

federation.name: Name
federation.toast_gmsApiKeyAndLocationUpdated: The GMS Api Key and the location have been successfully updated!
federation.toast_gmsApiKeyUpdated: The GMS Api Key has been successfully updated!
federation.toast_gmsLocationUpdated: The GMS location has been successfully updated!
federation.toast_hieroTopicIdUpdated: The Hiero Topic ID has been successfully updated!

latitude-longitude-smart.describe: Automatically splits coordinates in the format 'latitude, longitude'. Simply enter your coordinates from Google Maps here, for example: 49.28187664243721, 9.740672183943639.

transactionlist.confirmed: When was it confirmed by a moderator / admin.
transactionlist.periods: For what period was it submitted by the member.
transactionlist.status: [PENDING = submitted, DELETED = deleted, IN_PROGRESS = in dialogue with moderator, DENIED = rejected, CONFIRMED = confirmed]
transactionlist.submitted: When was it submitted by the member

hide_resubmission_tooltip: Hides all creations for which a moderator has set a reminder date.

moderator.history: The data has been changed. This is the old data.
moderator.memo-tooltip: Edit the text of the contribution
moderator.notice-tooltip: The note is only visible to moderators
moderator.request: This message is only visible to the moderators!

name: Name

navbar.projectBrandingTooltip: Use your own logo in the Gradido login and add new users to a Humhub space

no_hashtag_tooltip: Shows only contributions without hashtag in text

changeUserRole.question: Do you really want to change {username}'s role to {newRole}?
changeUserRole.title: Change user role

confirm.question: Do you really want to carry out and finally save this pre-stored creation?
confirm.text: After saving, the record can no longer be changed. Please check carefully that everything is correct.
confirm.title: Confirm creation!

delete.question: Do you really want to carry out and finally save this pre-stored creation?
delete.text: After saving, the record can no longer be changed or deleted. Please check carefully that everything is correct.
delete.title: Delete creation!

deleteUser.question: Do you really want to delete {username}?
deleteUser.title: Delete user

deny.question: Do you really want to carry out and finally save this pre-stored creation?
deny.text: After saving, the record can no longer be changed or deleted. Please check carefully that everything is correct.
deny.title: Reject creation!

undeleteUser.question: Do you really want to undelete {username}
undeleteUser.title: Undelete user

projectBranding.created: New project branding entry has been created.
projectBranding.error: Error when creating the project branding entry: {message}
projectBranding.newUserToSpaceTooltip: The hours should contain a maximum of two decimal places
projectBranding.title: Project Branding
projectBranding.updated: Project branding entry has been updated.

removeNotSelf: As an admin/moderator, you cannot delete yourself.

unregister_mail.error: Error sending the confirmation link to the user: {message}
unregister_mail.never_sent: It seems we did never send an email to the member {email}
unregister_mail.success: Successfully send the confirmation link to the user's email! ({email})
unregister_mail.text_false: The last email was sent to the member ({email}) on {date}.

userRole.notChangeYourSelf: As an admin/moderator, you cannot change your own role.
